description: The tape kicks off with Brock solo as he slowly seduces me and the camera and you with his tight, muscled and well-defined masterpiece of a body. And the great thing about Brock is that he hasn't lost his sense of manliness through his desire to look good and hasn't shaved his body bald like so many guys do that get so into the gym scene. It added a very nice touch that made him all the more man and twice as sexy. And beyond that gorgeous body there's that all-american look and that melting smile that pulls you in with Brock. You just want to be next him. You feel safe in his company and like you could just lay in his arms and be protected from the world.
title: Brock
